Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place
ShortDescription: EB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
